thread.title: Curt Schilling to Trump: ISIS won Democratic debate
thread.title_full: Curt Schilling to Trump: ISIS won Democratic debate

title: Curt Schilling to Trump: ISIS won Democratic debate
text:
Cardinals player shatters apartment window with home run Schilling's suggestion came in a tweet responding to Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump, who in live tweeting the debate asked his Twitter followers who was winning the first showdown of Democratic presidential candidates. Schilling's one-word response, simply "ISIS" without any other details or explanation, soon went viral. It has since been retweeted nearly more than 1,700 times and was "favorited" more than 2,000 times. ESPN, which suspended Schilling in August after he tweeted a re-post of a meme featuring an image of Adolf Hitler that compared Muslims to Nazis, did not release any comment on the ISIS tweet and Schilling has not followed up with any additional comments on the issue since Tuesday's debate. 
Although he did take exception to a tweet later Tuesday night accusing him of "rooting" for ISIS, responding "how is that even remotely what you got from that?" He followed that up with another tweet early Wednesday morning after another Twitter user asked for clarification on whether he supports ISIS or not, responding with "thats not a serious question right?"
